x:materials.p: Holotype: adult male (SCAU), China, Guizhou, Qianxinan Zizhizhou, Ceheng County, Rongdu Village, Cave Qiaoxia Dong, 24°03.008N, 105°43.147E, 964 m, 26.XII.2012, leg. Mingyi Tian, Weixin Liu, Feifei Sun & Haomin Yin. Paratypes. 1 male, 3 females, 10 juveniles (SCAU), same locality, together with holotype.
